app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Hi.Translate Translator
app_description: Powerful and easy to operate! Fast and accurate translation supporting more than 30 voice conversations Translation history and collection features support offline mode without worrying about disconnecting the network The Universal Language Handbook allows you to work live travel and support multiple languages Switch to other supported languages in the application language without modifying the system settings Night mode can be turned on at night All of the above features are completely unlimited and free.
